title: Modified whitehead hemorrhoidectomy versus partial hemorrhoidectomy for fourth-degree circular mixed hemorrhoids: A retrospective analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Xie Liu, Bo Sheng, Jianbo Zhang, Jijian Wang, Jun Yu, Guanggang Zhang, Fengshun Dai, Heng Su, Jingsong Xu, Wei Hu, Tong Li, Peng Zhu
